title: DietPi March 2024 news (version 9.2)
description: DietPi, a lightweight and optimized software for single-board computers, has announced its latest update, version 9.2, released on March 16th, 2024. This new release introduces a range of enhancements and bug fixes, focusing on improving user experience and system stability. DietPi: DietPi is a lightweight and optimized OS based on Linux, specifically designed for single-board […]

title: Renesas RA4E1/RA6M3 Reference Kits for AI & ML Applications
description: Renesas Electronics has recently unveiled two development kits featuring the RA4E1 and RA6M3 32-bit microcontroller units. These new kits are specifically designed to enable easy integration of AI and ML technologies into edge and other real-time applications. The first kit is called the RTK0EG0002 RA4E1 kit which is based on the RA4E1 32-bit MCU offering […]
